Injector/Manterror/Counter Punch/Double Punch/Ramhorn:



Manterror just layed there, his optics "shut" as Dark Mouse spoke somewhat to 
no one.

---

Injector got up, firing three stinger missiles at Triceradon's torso, and two 
optic blasts at Stegotron's left side.

---

Beeline, the cyber-bee controlled by Double Punch, dived down, two optic 
blasts launching out at Stegotron's left knee.

---

Counter Punch, laying on the ground from the kick-backs of his weapons.  
Raising both of them, he fired three photon blasts at Triceradon's abdomen 
(stomach region), and firing a single rocket at Stegotron, the kick back 
combined with the weak hold and position of the missiles launcher, sent the 
missile launcher flying backwards, landing 4 ft away.

---

Double Punch, still cloaked in his stealth mode, controlled Beeline.  After 
firing at the Maximals attacking that fool Injector, and a Predacon he'd 
never seen, he leapt from the bushes, raising  both pinchers, he fired a 
missile at Stegotron's back, and a missile at the back of Triceradon's left 
knee.

---

Ramhorn got up slowly.  Taking out a laser pistol, he fired two shots.  At 
the same time a photon blast skinned his hand.  Dropping the pistol, he 
noticed a small hole in Counter Punch's stomach.  Right were he had been 
aiming for.  Charging forward, he leapt through the air, attempting to tackle 
Mosquitor.
